      • prepareStroke

        public static java.awt.Stroke prepareStroke(java.awt.Stroke stroke,
                            PPaintContext paintContext)
        Workaround for Mac OS X Java, which doesn't support custom strokes at the time of writing. This method prepares the specified stroke for the specified paint context, returning a new instance of Stroke with a scaled line width if necessary.
        Parameters:
        stroke - stroke to prepare, must not be null
        paintContext - paint context, must not be null
        Returns:
        the specified stroke or a new instance of Stroke with a scaled line width if necessary
